scripts.install:musl: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y musl-tools && rustup target add x86_64-unknown-linux-musl
scripts.install:openssl: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y pkg-config libssl-dev
scripts.install:deps: npm run install:musl && npm run install:openssl
scripts.clean:rust: cargo clean --manifest-path=services/connect_ide/Cargo.toml && cargo clean --manifest-path=services/ec_api_adapter/Cargo.toml && cargo clean --manifest-path=services/www/Cargo.toml && cargo clean --manifest-path=services/generic-auth-module/Cargo.toml
scripts.clean:docker: sudo docker ps -a | awk '/ec_/ {print $1}' | xargs -r sudo docker rm -f && sudo docker images | awk '/ec_/ {print $3}' | xargs -r sudo docker rmi -f
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:rust && npm run clean:docker
scripts.build:all:binaries: npm run build:connect_ide && npm run build:ec_api_adapter && npm run build:www && npm run build:generic-auth-module && npm run build:mailing_service
scripts.build:docker:all: npm run build:docker:ec_connect_ide && npm run build:docker:ec_client && npm run build:docker:ec_access_control && npm run build:docker:ec_gateway && npm run build:docker:ec_mailing_service
scripts.run:all: npm run run:ec_connect_ide & npm run run:ec_api_adapter & npm run run:ec_client & npm run run:ec_access_control
scripts.deploy: npm run install:deps && npm run clean:all && npm run build:all:binaries && npm run build:docker:all && npm run run:all
